alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 1:05PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SHELBY AND SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM CST... At 105 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shelby County Airport, or near Alabaster, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Alabaster, Pelham, Mountain Brook, Trussville, Helena, Irondale, Leeds, Moody, Calera, Chelsea, Columbiana, Indian Springs Village, Vincent, Westover, Shops of Grand River, Oak Mountain State Park, Vandiver, and Barber Motorsports Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
